arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur 1-2 Aston Villa: Spurs winless run in Premier League home games continues
arts.sum: They only took three shots in the first half - all were from outside the box and two were taken by Matty Cash, their only goal scorer away from home in the Premier League prior to kickoff. Spurs opened the scoring after just five minutes, having the first corner of the game by putting Villa under pressure in their defensive third.

arts.ttl: Villa fight back to win at Tottenham
arts.sum: Aston Villa fight back from a goal down to beat Spurs 2-1 at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.

arts.ttl: View: 'Exceptional' verdict right for 100% Aston Villa ace after what Keane saw pre-Tottenham win

arts.ttl: Tottenham 1-2 Aston Villa: Emi Buendia is bubbling again as Spurs' issues at home deepen - with Thomas Frank's side devoid of creativity
arts.sum: Buendia's exquisite goal was worthy of winning any Premier League contest. Not simply the finish, curled inside the post from the fringes of the penalty area with his left foot but all that went before.

arts.ttl: Tottenham 'aggressive and intense' but not enough - Frank
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur manager Thomas Frank says his side came out "aggressive and intense" but it was not enough to counter Aston Villa's finishing during a 2-1 defeat.

arts.ttl: Ex-FIFA official hits out at Simon Hooper over footage from Aston Villa win v Tottenham

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur 1-1 Aston Villa: Spurs winless run in Premier League home games continues
arts.sum: They only took three shots in the first half - all were from outside the box and two were taken by Matty Cash, their only goal scorer away from home in the Premier League prior to kickoff. Spurs opened the scoring after just five minutes, having the first corner of the game by putting Villa under pressure in their defensive third.

arts.ttl: Buendia brilliance sinks Spurs for resurgent Villa in Premier League comeback
arts.sum: Unai Emery's Aston Villa continued their excellent form on Sunday with a 2-1 Premier League win over Thomas Frank's Tottenham Hotspur at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
